General.Name: Optipharm.CO.LTD
General.Description: Optipharm.CO.,LTD focuses on providing disease diagnosis and livestock research services in Korea. It develops cell therapy products through animal stem cells, as well as protein drugs using bio-reactors; and selects and develops antibiotic/antiviral components. The company was formerly known as Optiparm Solution Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Optipharm.CO.,LTD in 2012. Optipharm.CO.,LTD was founded in 2006 and is based in Cheongju, South Korea.
General.Address: Osong Life 6 Route 63, Cheongju, South Korea, 361370
